com.se.simplicity.vector
Interface RGBColourVectorf

All Superinterfaces:
Vectorf
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleRGBColourVectorf4
public interface RGBColourVectorf
extends Vectorf

A colour vector that stores its data in a float array.

Author:
Gary Buyn
